name: Fore Squared
description: “Fore Squared” is composed of 16 MPEG 4 files minted chronologically. Click on the tag “ForeSquared” below to see this work in its entirety. If you collect all 16 - ¡¡ and you should !! - then you can see them as intended in the 4 x 4 grid. Shout out to Derrick Shultz @dvsch for teaching “Video Art with FFMPEG” where I learned these neat tricks using hue rotation, overlay and cropping. 06/14/21
